channel.title: Activate and read
channel.description: Oke i created 4 custom items with an Activate & Read thing but if i click Read nothing happend (This is because i didnt code it yet) But if i click on Activate it puts the scroll into my weapon slot how can i fix this :S (CODES ARE 6798 till 6801)

item.title: Activate and read
item.dc:creator: @adrian1372 adrian1372
item.description:
@adrian1372 wrote:

I think he means that he didn’t code the read action,
but when he tries to activate (it seems he coded it),
he equips it as a weapon.

Well, you have to declare it as a scroll/book or whatever somewhere, but i’ll leave that to the pro’s

anyways, are you using Delta, PI or what?
